akn:section.akn:heading: Presentation of Comprehensive Housing Strategy; public meetings.

akn:content.akn:p: Within 12 months after the Council’s confirmation of the Mayor’s nominations to the Task Force, the Task Force shall present the Comprehensive Housing Strategy to the Council and the Mayor.
